term.title: secular equilibrium

item.text: Radioactive equilibrium where the half life of the precursor isotope is so long that the change of its activity can be ignored during the period of interest and all activities remain constant.

item.title: precursor isotope (of a radionuclide) (in radioanalytical chemistry)
activity (of a radionuclide) (in radioanalytical chemistry) (of a radioactive material)
